snippet: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. named Judge José A. Cabranes, a Democratic appointee, to a panel that hears appeals of a secret surveillance court’s rulings.
abstract: Chief Justice John G Roberts Jr, who has filled secret court that oversees surveillance almost entirely with Republican-appointed judges, names Judge Jose A Cabranes, Democratic appointee, to panel that hears rare appeals of surveillance court’s rulings.
lead_paragraph: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. named Judge José A. Cabranes, a Democratic appointee, to a panel that hears appeals of a secret surveillance court’s rulings.

headline.main: Newest Spy Court Pick Is a Democrat but Not a Liberal
headline.print_headline: Roberts Varies Pattern In Choice for Spy Court
